name: Category Family Tree
author: Nasibu Njoka

sections.description:
Show Category parents and sub categories of the same parent of the current post/page’s category on the sidebar of a single post or a page or an archive, highlight the current subcategory the post is in
and unlike most of similar plugins out there, this one shows where the user is from, where he/she is and where to go
this is helpful for navigation and the overall user experience. Inspired by the problem i was facing when doing a client’s site and i think many of you
out there meet the same challenges
sections.installation:
You can install Category Family Tree directly from the WordPress admin panel.
Visit the Plugins > Add New and search for ‘Category Family Tree’.
Click to install.
Once installed, activate and it is functional.

Manual Installation Category Family Tree plugin:
Download and unzip the file
Upload the full extracted folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
You’re done! The Plugin ready to use according to the directions in the description.

short_description: Show Category ancestors and sub categories on the sidebar
